5a13863f8bf55085c847d43d.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43d.name: Switcheroo!
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43d.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, drain Mana, and scale {{ e5 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ f4 }}% (bonus scales with spell rank and Jinx's level). Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

5a1386408bf55085c847d486.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d486.name: Triggerseed
5a1386408bf55085c847d486.tooltip:
Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Can also be cast on Daisy.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c8.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c8.name: Flame Chompers!
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c8.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

5a1386598bf55085c847d5ff.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5ff.name: Rewind
5a1386598bf55085c847d5ff.tooltip: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5de.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5de.name: Whiplash
5a1386568bf55085c847d5de.tooltip:
Whip target with Lashers, applying on hit effects and dealing magic damage equal to {{ f1 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health. Then, gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers it. When empowered, Whiplash pulls Evelynn to her target, dealing magic damage to them and enemies in the way equal to {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their max health.

5a1386438bf55085c847d54a.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54a.name: Searing Charge
5a1386438bf55085c847d54a.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, the resulting shockwave will deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and knock up enemies for {{ e6 }} second.

The shockwave destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemy champions.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d43a.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43a.name: Aria of Perseverance
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43a.tooltip:
Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage within the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1384708bf55085c84797e7.description:
Can only carry 3 Stealth Wards in inventory.

Click to Consume: Place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes.
5a1384708bf55085c84797e7.name: Pilfered Stealth Ward

5a13846f8bf55085c84797c5.description:
+20 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 18 additional magic damage and grant 15 Gold per unique spell cast. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing minions slows Tribute generation.
UNIQUE Passive: Gain Bandit.
QUEST: Earn 750 gold using this item.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.
5a13846f8bf55085c84797c5.name: Frostfang

5a1384708bf55085c84797df.description:
+45 Armor
+175% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +20% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.
UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 40 gold or 6% missing mana (minimum 10). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active: Grants nearby allies +40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive: Gain Bandit.
QUEST: Earn 750 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Praise the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 September, 25 CLE
5a1384708bf55085c84797df.name: Talisman of Ascension

5a13846f8bf55085c84797b6.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. Refunds 25% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +12 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 3 times every 12 seconds).

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.
5a13846f8bf55085c84797b6.name: Archangel's Staff (Quick Charge)

5a1384558bf55085c84796b5.description:
+40 Attack Damage
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Heal for 15% of damage dealt. This is 33% as effective for Area of Effect damage.
UNIQUE Active - Lightning Bolt: Deals 175 - 250 (+30% of Ability Power) magic damage and slows the target champion's Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds (40 second cooldown, shared with other Hextech items).
5a1384558bf55085c84796b5.name: Hextech Gunblade

5a1384708bf55085c84797ce.description:
Click to Consume: Contains 20-100 gold.

Can be sold for 65 gold.
5a1384708bf55085c84797ce.name: Sly Sack of Gold
